name: specberus
description: Specberus is a checker used at W3C to validate the compliance of Technical Reports with publication rules.

scripts.audit: npm audit | grep -oE 'https?\:\/\/(www\.)?(nodesecurity\.io|npmjs\.com)\/advisories\/[[:digit:]]+' | rev | cut -d '/' -f 1 | rev | diff known-vulns.txt -
scripts.lint: eslint app.js lib/ public/ test/ tools/
scripts.hint: jshint app.js lib/ public/ test/ tools/
scripts.jsdoc: jsdoc --configure jsdoc.json -r app.js lib/ public/ test/ tools/
scripts.build: npm run audit && npm run lint && npm run hint && npm run test && npm run jsdoc
